mapper.select: select id, name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.work_achievement where id = #{id}

select id, name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.work_achievement where user_id = #{userId}

select id, name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.work_achievement limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select id, name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.work_achievement
mapper.insert: insert into scientific_research.work_achievement (name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information) values (#{name}, #{publisher}, #{publishLevel}, #{workType}, #{publishLocation}, #{isbnId}, #{isTranslate}, #{translateLanguage}, #{discipline}, #{beginDate}, #{characters}, #{firstDiscipline}, #{collegeId}, #{workSource}, #{userId}, #{information})

insert into scientific_research.work_achievement(name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.publisher}, #{entity.publishLevel}, #{entity.workType}, #{entity.publishLocation}, #{entity.isbnId}, #{entity.isTranslate}, #{entity.translateLanguage}, #{entity.discipline}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.characters}, #{entity.firstDiscipline}, #{entity.collegeId}, #{entity.workSource}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.information})

insert into scientific_research.work_achievement(name, publisher, publish_level, work_type, publish_location, isbn_id, is_translate, translate_language, discipline, begin_date, characters, first_discipline, college_id, work_source, user_id, information) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.publisher}, #{entity.publishLevel}, #{entity.workType}, #{entity.publishLocation}, #{entity.isbnId}, #{entity.isTranslate}, #{entity.translateLanguage}, #{entity.discipline}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.characters}, #{entity.firstDiscipline}, #{entity.collegeId}, #{entity.workSource}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.information})
on duplicate key update name = values(name) , publisher = values(publisher) , publish_level = values(publish_level) , work_type = values(work_type) , publish_location = values(publish_location) , isbn_id = values(isbn_id) , is_translate = values(is_translate) , translate_language = values(translate_language) , discipline = values(discipline) , begin_date = values(begin_date) , characters = values(characters) , first_discipline = values(first_discipline) , college_id = values(college_id) , work_source = values(work_source) , user_id = values(user_id) , information = values(information)
mapper.update:
update scientific_research.work_achievement
name = #{name},
publisher = #{publisher},
publish_level = #{publishLevel},
work_type = #{workType},
publish_location = #{publishLocation},
isbn_id = #{isbnId},
is_translate = #{isTranslate},
translate_language = #{translateLanguage},
discipline = #{discipline},
begin_date = #{beginDate},
characters = #{characters},
first_discipline = #{firstDiscipline},
college_id = #{collegeId},
work_source = #{workSource},
user_id = #{userId},
information = #{information},
where id = #{id}
